title: Sky bingo
text: . I've been playing on the sky bingo app and sky vegas app for about a year now. I haven't lost loads of money as I've won quite a few times either on the slots or playing bingo. I recommend new people wanting to play bingo or other games to down load the sky apps as they pay your winnings into your bank account within 2 working days and do not mess you about like other apps I've played. Would recommend sky to my friends and family as they've not let me down yet . !!!

title: Bingo Fun
text:
Sky bingo is one of my favourite sites to play the app has easy to use access rooms and a good selection of affordable games and some higher priced games with the option to play for some decent prize money. I only play what I can afford which is not a lot but affordable for my budget. Plus you can set limits to stay in control of your spending. Good Luck MPQMPQ
The app recently has been a bit temperamental and unreliable june/july 2017 many updates happening so hang in there I'm sure the guys at virturefusion are working on making the app the best it can be for sky as I still keep coming back!
